changelog:
FINALLY fixed mod shutdown delay
Fixed mod not loading in newer forge versions
Updated dependencies
Done some code cleanup and rewriting
Added webhook caching

NOTE: Update will use new config file!
To migrate, you can use this default configuration file: https://gist.githubusercontent.com/ErdbeerbaerLP/2b8e4ad30c14bc2941e0f7de63bcaf62/raw/Discord-Integration.toml (save it as Discord-Integration.toml)

Fixed mod not loading in newer forge versions
Updated dependencies

Fixed mod not loading in newer forge versions, Now using mixin provided by forge itself.
Added config option to require an space at the end of the command prefix
Removed channel description feature
Fixed clients seeing, that they are missing an mod

Fixed crash without emojicord
Fixed avatar URL not working
Moved around the link configs. THIS WILL RESET THE "allow-linking" CONFIG VALUE!
Added link role (you get it in discord when linking to minecraft)
More configurable messages
Fixed server crash when linked player joins
Fixed linked player name not being used in some messages (join/leave/...)

Added config option to ignore /say messages starting with an specific prefix
Added full Emojicord integration (required emotes enabled on client and emojicord on installed server!)
Fix possible crashes with update checker and fix forgetting to increment version number :/
Fixed formatting issues with command, advancement and maybe more messages

Added update checker
Added small event handler
Fix ingame /discord command to show the invite message again
Removed seconds from default uptime format because of rate limits
Fix disabling item tooltips
Fixed disabling shutdown message
Emotes now no longer show thier ID but only the name
